name.jp: 装備レベル減少の巻物A

description.en: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.ar: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.br: Reduz o nível exigido para utilização de um item em 10. Uma vez alterado, não pode ser negociado ou descartado. Não é possível usar mais de um pergaminho da redução em um mesmo item. Visite a [Especialista em Joias] Peach em Flarine para remover a redução.
description.cns: 将物品的使用等级降低10。一旦更改，物品将无法交易或丢弃。 访问帕里的[珠宝大师]皮奇以解除该效果。
description.de: Diese Rolle senkt die Lvl-Anforderungen eines Gegenstandes um 10. Einmal angewendet, kann der Gegenstand nicht mehr gehandelt werden. Besuche Jewel Manager Peach in Flaris, um die Lvl-Absenkung zu entfernen.
description.fi: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.fil: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.fr: Parchemin réduisant le niveau auquel l'objet peut être équipé de 10. L'objet ainsi modifié ne peut plus être échangé, déposé au sol ou en banque à moins de supprimer la réduction de niveau chez Angie, à Flarine. Non cumulable.
description.id: Mengurangi level yang diperlukan untuk menggunakan item sebesar 10. Setelah diubah, itu tidak dapat diperdagangkan atau dijatuhkan. Anda tidak dapat menumpuk gulungan pengurangan pada satu item. Kunjungi Jewel Manager Peach di Flarine untuk menghilangkan pengurangan tersebut.
description.it: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.jp: アイテムの装備可能レベルを－10にする神秘の巻物。適用したアイテムは取引やドロップができなくなります。フラリスの[ボボタの助手]ピーチにて減少を解除することで、再び取引ができるようになります。
description.kr: 아이템 착용 레벨을 -10 하락시켜 주는 신비의 두루마리. 한번 변경되면, 거래나 버리기가 불가능하다. 플라리네의 쥬얼 매니저 피치를 방문하여 감소효과를 제거하세요.
description.nl: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.pl: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.ru: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.sp: Reduce el nivel requerido para usar un objeto en 10. Una vez utilizado en el objeto, este no podrá ser intercambiado ni tirado al suelo. No puedes acumular pergaminos de reducción en un mismo objeto. Visita a la Mánager de Gemas Peach en Flarine para eliminar la reducción.
description.sw: Reduces the required level to use an item by 10. Once changed, it cannot be traded or dropped. You cannot stack scrolls of reduction on a single item. Visit Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine to remove the reduction.
description.th: ลดเลเวลที่จำเป็นในการใช้ไอเท็มลง 10 เลเวลเมื่อเปลี่ยนแล้ว จะไม่สามารถแลกเปลี่ยนหรือทิ้งได้ คุณไม่สามารถซ้อนไอเทมนี้ของการลดลงในไอเทมในรายการเดียวได้ เยี่ยมชม Jewel Manager Peach ใน Flarine เพื่อลบการลดลง
description.tw: 減少物品的裝備需求等級10，一旦更改後，將無法交易或丟棄，需要尋找布拉里斯的寶石專家波奇移除效果。
description.vi: Giảm cấp độ yêu cầu để sử dụng một vật phẩm xuống 10. Sau khi thay đổi, nó không thể được giao dịch hoặc giảm xuống. Bạn không thể xếp chồng các cuộn giảm trên một mục duy nhất. Ghé thăm Jewel Manager Peach ở Flarine để loại bỏ mức giảm.
